common.additionalDescription: It is suitable for playing, sleeping, room decoration and as an antistress. The toy is easy to wash and retains its shape . Moms will appreciate it! A perfect gift for a birthday, holiday or just for joy.

tiger_dream_keeper.title: Tiger the Handsome is keeper of dreams
tiger_dream_keeper.description: Tiger the Handsome is a stylish and kind stuffed tiger cub in fancy overalls with a bow. He's not just a toy , he's the keeper of children's dreams and secrets. Its soft body, kind eyes and cozy texture make it an ideal companion for sleeping, playing and cuddling.

bunny_hopping.title: Bunny Hopping is a storyteller
bunny_hopping.description: The Bunny is a stuffed animal with pigtails and a book in its paws. She loves to tell fairy tales and share good stories before going to bed. Her kind eyes, cozy outfit and delicate texture make her an ideal companion for kids.

cutie_luna_antistress.title: Cutie Luna gives honey
cutie_luna_antistress.description: Charming Moon bee with a jar of magic honey is a soft antiâ€”stress toy that you want to hug. Bright design, wings, bows and kind eyes make her a favorite of children.

bella_the_squirrel.title: Bella the squirrel loves nuts
bella_the_squirrel.description: Bella is a charming squirrel with pigtails and a cute outfit. In her paws is a favorite nut, and on her face is a kind smile. Soft, cozy and stylish, Bella will become the best friend for playing, sleeping and decorating the children's room.

fairy_butterfly.title: Fairy Butterfly will give you sweet dreams
fairy_butterfly.description: Fairy Butterfly is a gentle and magical bedfellow. Her soft wings, radiant smile and fabulous image help kids to relax and immerse themselves in the world of good dreams. It was as if she had flown out of a fairy tale to hug and comfort.

peter_the_hedgehog.title: Peter the hedgehog is a mushroom lover
peter_the_hedgehog.description: Petya is a cute teddy hedgehog with a kind smile. He loves forest walks and collects his favorite mushrooms. Soft, cozy and safe , Petya will become a loyal friend to the child at home and on the road.

little_fox_sister.title: Little Fox Sister loves adventures
little_fox_sister.description: Little Fox Sister is a mischievous and kind traveler. In her smart dress and with a basket in her paws, she is ready for new discoveries and forest walks. Soft, bright and cozy  it inspires kids to play and imagine.

birthday_mouse.title: Mouse - I'm going to your birthday party
birthday_mouse.description: The mouse is a charming teddy mouse with a gentle smile and a kind heart. Her round ears, naughty bow and soft dress make her an ideal companion for games, fairy tales and cozy hugs. The mouse loves flowers, friendship and always brings warmth and joy with him.

gena_is_a_football_player.title: Gena is a football player which gives you a good mood
gena_is_a_football_player.description: Gena is active, kind and always ready to play. Gena inspires movement, friendship and fun adventures. Soft, sporty and charming  it's perfect for playing, cuddling and decorating a child's room.

the_croaking_frog.title: Frog Croaker loves outfits
the_croaking_frog.description: Croaker is a fashionista among plush friends. Her butterfly outfit and stylish bow make her a real star of the children's collection. Soft, bright and charming, she inspires kids to play and be creative.

sharik_champ.title: Sharik is the champion of fun ball games
sharik_champ.description: Sharik is an energetic and kind teddy dog who loves to play ball. His athletic spirit, bright outfit and friendly face inspire kids to move and have fun games.

kitty_cat.title: Kitty Cat is a beauty in a dress
kitty_cat.description: Kitty Cat is a real fashionista! Her elegant dress, expressive eyes and gentle smile make her a favorite of girls. Soft, stylish and cozy, it is perfect for playing, cuddling and decorating the children's room.
